Thank you for submitting your information to help local teachers. Teachers will be using this map of volunteers to find and contact volunteers like you. You can review this guide to get a better idea of what your volunteer experience will be like and to review tips for connecting with students.

If you need to update your information or want to unsubscribe from teacher requests, use this link:

https://test.code.org/volunteer/engineer/edit/unique-secret-for-VolunteerEngineerSubmission2015/

Thanks again for your support,

Alice Steinglass
President, Code.org

Code.org is a 501c3 non-profit. Our address is 1501 4th Avenue, Suite 900, Seattle, WA 98101. You can update your email preferences and edit your submitted information at any time.
